body: Ok so, I recently went away and I has not logged on to avicus since. All my other servers work fine, but avic.us for some reason is blocked out and I am not sure why! I really want to get back on. If someone hacked into my computer please stop! if anyone can help, that would be really nice, thank you.<br id="null"><br id="null">~NoSwordJustBow
